title: RBI Grade B - ESI - FLM1 - Descriptive

quiz.text:
Ques.1) Examine the role of MSMEâ€™s in the growth of Indian Economy.
[Marks: 10, Word Limit: 400, Difficulty Level: Moderate]

Ques.1) What do you mean by Demographic dividend? Discuss the advantages and challenges associated with it. Also suggest the way forward to overcome the challenges.
[Marks: 15, Word Limit: 600, Difficulty Level: Easy]

Ques.2) Discuss how recently passed Labour codes can have a transformative impact on Labour empowerment in India. Also, discuss the challenges associated with the codes.
[Marks: 10, Word Limit: 400, Difficulty Level: Difficult]

Ques.2) India's concern with poverty alleviation has mostly remained at the rhetorical level. Explain.
[Marks: 15, Word Limit: 600, Difficulty Level: Difficult]

Ques.3) Define potential GDP and explain its determinants. What are the factors that have been inhibiting India from realizing its potential GDP?
[Marks: 10, Word Limit: 400, Difficulty Level: Easy]
Ques.3) What do you mean by Minimum Support Price (MSP)? How will MSP rescue the farmers from the low-income trap? [Marks: 15, Word Limit: 600, Difficulty Level: Moderate]
